name: PONGigin
description:
the inspiration for this game came from OriginPC's CEO's instagram repost here: https://www.instagram.com/p/B2UZmt7joEl/?utm_source=ig_web_options_share_sheet

and i thought it'd be cool to challenge myself to finish a game in a day(finishing one is already a challenge for me). but hey, i made it! hope you enjoy this little game. there's a bigger game im working on so this is gonna be my last release for a while but i'll try to have these little projects in between :D
